name: VR Water Slide Adventure 2
description:
The VR water slide adventure 2 is all about splashing in extreme waterslides and swimming pool rush. Rush on a 3D water rollercoaster VR to enjoy the ride of most furious and world tallest water slides in most realistic virtual reality mode. Enjoy the amazing swimming pool water park adventure VR with cool water slide rides and immerse yourself in the world of ultimate fun and adventure. Whizz through the big water waves and perform amazing acrobatic stunts while taking the sharp and narrow turns without falling off. Make your way through incredible hurdles and obstacles while collecting the maximum coins and speed boosters and avoid crashing with hazards. You can ride the multiple free fall waterslides in this VR beach slide game. Experience the most realistic waterslide 3D simulation for the first time and forget all old fashioned VR water sliding games. This amusement park waterslide is a great addition to roller coaster games due to its amazing and cool water slides. So enjoy your thrilling and furious fun ride like a real water splashier.

VR Water Slide Adventure 2 is one of the best waterslide 3D games of 2017. Buckle up for the real ultimate and thrilling stunt action while rushing through the craziest and longest waterslides of the world. There are multiple VR water theme parks available to unlock in this amazing and insane waterslide game. You can enjoy the multiple beautiful terrains like beach, mountain etc. in this virtual reality game. You can choose multiple riders with beautiful and modern rides to rush on the rollercoaster style waterslides fast. Select your favorite rider to double your fun adventure and use the coins to buy and upgrade multiple new VR water park game features. You can collect coins or buy it from the game store.

The VR water slide adventure 2 is an outstanding virtual reality simulation game which is designed with world tallest and longest waterslides. Also, there is a realistic 3D water pool in the mid of amusement waterpark to give you real taste of big water splashes. The VR aqua adventure park has several modern waterslides with toughest and challenging turns and tunnels. You may have played many VR waterside adventure games but this waterslide simulator VR is far better than all the typical waterslide games due to its special virtual reality effect. Just choose your favorite character from the game menu and relish in ultimate fun and adventure world. Enjoy the tallest hydro slides of the world while staying at home and experience the ride of most dangerous 3D water rollercoaster of your life. So, download this amazing VR simulator and immerse yourself in waterslide adventure VR.
 

Game Features of VR Water Slide Adventure 2:

• You must have gyro sensor in your android device to play this game.
• Slide your device into VR glasses and adjust the Glasses spacing.
• Different unique and amazing riders in game store.
• HD graphics and real VR adventure park environment.
• Real water splashing sounds and whizzing effects.
• Object collection like coins and magnets etc.
• 3D Rollercoaster style aqua ride.
• World tallest and longest waterslide simulation in VR mode.

Game Play:

• Tilt your head to move the rider left/right.
• Take sharp turns with extreme care.
• Collect as many coins as you can. Use magnets to collect maximum coins.
• Keep an eye on hurdles and obstacles and avoid collapse with them.
If you like the VR Water Slide Adventure 2 game, please try our other adventure games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review
